remark.p: Advisor, Program Coordination Staff, Office of Policy and Plans, United States Information Agency until 1973; thereafter Executive Director, National Commission on the Observance of the International Women’s Year; Coordinator for International Women’s Year, Office of the Deputy Secretary of State

Deputy Assistant Secretary of State for Educational and Cultural Affairs, until March 1978; Director, Office of Institutional Relations, Associate Directorate for Educational and Cultural Affairs, U.S. International Communication Agency, from March 1978
